evaluations.query: Check this README file for linting issues and fix them
expected_behavior: Identifies markdownlint violations (missing headers, inconsistent list formatting, etc.)
Provides specific line numbers and rule violations
Offers to fix issues automatically or provides clear guidance
Validates the corrected file passes linting

evaluations.query: Validate the code samples in this documentation and fix any syntax errors
expected_behavior: Parses fenced code blocks and identifies the specified language
Validates syntax using appropriate language parser (JavaScript, Python, etc.)
Reports syntax errors with line numbers within code blocks
Suggests corrections for invalid code samples

evaluations.query: Check all links in this document and fix the table formatting
expected_behavior: Validates all internal and external links are accessible
Reports broken links with specific URLs and error types
Identifies malformed tables and alignment issues
Fixes table formatting to be properly aligned and structured
Ensures CommonMark compliance while maintaining readability
